018package com.scivicslab.actoriac;
019
020import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
021import java.util.logging.Level;
022import java.util.logging.Logger;
023
024import org.json.JSONObject;
025
026import com.scivicslab.actoriac.log.DistributedLogStore;
027import com.scivicslab.actoriac.log.LogLevel;
028import com.scivicslab.actoriac.log.SessionStatus;
029import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActionResult;
030import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorRef;
031import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorSystem;
032
033/**
034 * Actor wrapper for DistributedLogStore.
035 *
036 * <p>This actor centralizes all database writes for logging. It should be created
037 * under ROOT and used by all accumulator actors in the system.</p>
038 *
039 * <p>To ensure logs are written without blocking workflow execution, this actor
040 * should be called using a dedicated ManagedThreadPool with 1 thread:</p>
041 *
042 * <pre>{@code
043 * // Setup
044 * system.addManagedThreadPool(1);  // index 1 for DB writes
045 * ExecutorService dbPool = system.getManagedThreadPool(1);
046 *
047 * // Usage from accumulator
048 * logStoreActor.tell(store -> store.log(...), dbPool);
049 * }</pre>
050 *
051 * <h2>Actor Tree Position</h2>
052 * <pre>
053 * ROOT
054 * ├── logStore              &lt;-- this actor
055 * ├── accumulator           (system-level)
056 * └── nodeGroup
057 *     ├── accumulator       (workflow-level)
058 *     └── node-*
059 * </pre>
060 *
061 * <h2>Supported Actions</h2>
062 * <ul>
063 *   <li>{@code log} - Log a message with level</li>
064 *   <li>{@code logAction} - Log an action result</li>
065 *   <li>{@code startSession} - Start a new workflow session</li>
066 *   <li>{@code endSession} - End a workflow session</li>
067 *   <li>{@code markNodeSuccess} - Mark a node as succeeded</li>
068 *   <li>{@code markNodeFailed} - Mark a node as failed</li>
069 * </ul>
070 *
071 * @author devteam@scivicslab.com
072 * @since 2.13.0
073 */
074public class LogStoreIIAR extends IIActorRef<DistributedLogStore> {
075
076    private static final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(LogStoreIIAR.class.getName());
077
078    /**
079     * The dedicated executor service for DB writes.
080     * Using a single-threaded pool ensures writes are serialized.
081     */
082    private final ExecutorService dbExecutor;
083
084    /**
085     * Constructs a new LogStoreIIAR.
086     *
087     * @param actorName the name of this actor (typically "logStore")
088     * @param logStore the DistributedLogStore implementation
089     * @param system the actor system
090     * @param dbExecutor the dedicated executor service for DB writes (should be single-threaded)
091     */
092    public LogStoreIIAR(String actorName, DistributedLogStore logStore,
093                        IIActorSystem system, ExecutorService dbExecutor) {
094        super(actorName, logStore, system);
095        this.dbExecutor = dbExecutor;
096    }
097
098    @Override
099    public ActionResult callByActionName(String actionName, String arg) {
100        logger.fine(String.format("actionName = %s, arg = %s", actionName, arg));
101
102        try {
103            switch (actionName) {
104                case "log":
105                    return handleLog(arg);
106
107                case "logAction":
108                    return handleLogAction(arg);
109
110                case "startSession":
111                    return handleStartSession(arg);
112
113                case "endSession":
114                    return handleEndSession(arg);
115
116                case "markNodeSuccess":
117                    return handleMarkNodeSuccess(arg);
118
119                case "markNodeFailed":
120                    return handleMarkNodeFailed(arg);
121
122                default:
123                    logger.warning("Unknown action: " + actionName);
124                    return new ActionResult(false, "Unknown action: " + actionName);
125            }
126        } catch (Exception e) {
127            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error in " + actionName, e);
128            return new ActionResult(false, "Error: " + e.getMessage());
129        }
130    }
131
132    /**
133     * Handles the log action.
134     *
135     * @param arg JSON with sessionId, nodeId, level, message
136     * @return ActionResult
137     */
138    private ActionResult handleLog(String arg) throws Exception {
139        JSONObject json = new JSONObject(arg);
140        long sessionId = json.getLong("sessionId");
141        String nodeId = json.getString("nodeId");
142        String levelStr = json.getString("level");
143        String message = json.getString("message");
144
145        LogLevel level = LogLevel.valueOf(levelStr);
146
147        this.tell(store -> store.log(sessionId, nodeId, level, message), dbExecutor).get();
148
149        return new ActionResult(true, "Logged");
150    }
151
152    /**
153     * Handles the logAction action.
154     *
155     * @param arg JSON with sessionId, nodeId, label, actionName, exitCode, durationMs, output
156     * @return ActionResult
157     */
158    private ActionResult handleLogAction(String arg) throws Exception {
159        JSONObject json = new JSONObject(arg);
160        long sessionId = json.getLong("sessionId");
161        String nodeId = json.getString("nodeId");
162        String label = json.getString("label");
163        String action = json.getString("actionName");
164        int exitCode = json.getInt("exitCode");
165        long durationMs = json.getLong("durationMs");
166        String output = json.getString("output");
167
168        this.tell(store -> store.logAction(sessionId, nodeId, label, action, exitCode, durationMs, output),
169                  dbExecutor).get();
170
171        return new ActionResult(true, "Action logged");
172    }
173
174    /**
175     * Handles the startSession action.
176     *
177     * @param arg JSON with workflowName, overlayName, inventoryName, nodeCount
178     * @return ActionResult with session ID
179     */
180    private ActionResult handleStartSession(String arg) throws Exception {
181        JSONObject json = new JSONObject(arg);
182        String workflowName = json.getString("workflowName");
183        String overlayName = json.optString("overlayName", null);
184        String inventoryName = json.optString("inventoryName", null);
185        int nodeCount = json.getInt("nodeCount");
186
187        long sessionId = this.ask(store ->
188            store.startSession(workflowName, overlayName, inventoryName, nodeCount),
189            dbExecutor).get();
190
191        return new ActionResult(true, String.valueOf(sessionId));
192    }
193
194    /**
195     * Handles the endSession action.
196     *
197     * @param arg JSON with sessionId, status
198     * @return ActionResult
199     */
200    private ActionResult handleEndSession(String arg) throws Exception {
201        JSONObject json = new JSONObject(arg);
202        long sessionId = json.getLong("sessionId");
203        String statusStr = json.getString("status");
204
205        SessionStatus status = SessionStatus.valueOf(statusStr);
206
207        this.tell(store -> store.endSession(sessionId, status), dbExecutor).get();
208
209        return new ActionResult(true, "Session ended");
210    }
211
212    /**
213     * Handles the markNodeSuccess action.
214     *
215     * @param arg JSON with sessionId, nodeId
216     * @return ActionResult
217     */
218    private ActionResult handleMarkNodeSuccess(String arg) throws Exception {
219        JSONObject json = new JSONObject(arg);
220        long sessionId = json.getLong("sessionId");
221        String nodeId = json.getString("nodeId");
222
223        this.tell(store -> store.markNodeSuccess(sessionId, nodeId), dbExecutor).get();
224
225        return new ActionResult(true, "Node marked as success");
226    }
227
228    /**
229     * Handles the markNodeFailed action.
230     *
231     * @param arg JSON with sessionId, nodeId, reason
232     * @return ActionResult
233     */
234    private ActionResult handleMarkNodeFailed(String arg) throws Exception {
235        JSONObject json = new JSONObject(arg);
236        long sessionId = json.getLong("sessionId");
237        String nodeId = json.getString("nodeId");
238        String reason = json.getString("reason");
239
240        this.tell(store -> store.markNodeFailed(sessionId, nodeId, reason), dbExecutor).get();
241
242        return new ActionResult(true, "Node marked as failed");
243    }
244
245    /**
246     * Gets the dedicated executor service for DB writes.
247     *
248     * @return the DB executor service
249     */
250    public ExecutorService getDbExecutor() {
251        return dbExecutor;
252    }
253}
